control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs automatic temperature and humidity controls in the facility to prevent fluctuations potentially harmful to the information system.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization plans the location or site of the facility where the information system resides with regard to physical and environmental hazards and for existing facilities, considers the physical and environmental hazards in its risk mitigation strategy.

Control Statement: The organization employs automatic temperature and humidity controls in the facility to prevent fluctuations potentially harmful to the information system.
